pages.text: $(li)Donkeys are passive animals that can be found in the $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/grass/plains)Plains$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/desert/savanna)Savannas$(/l) and in the $(l:patchouli:villagers/villagers)Villages$(/l) of the Overworld.$(br)$(li)They can be tamed right clicking on them to mounts it.$(br)$(li)You will have to repeat this process until hearts appears above the Donkey.

$(li)Now, to ride the tamed Donkey, you have to right click on it while you are holding a $(l:patchouli:pets/vanilla/saddle)Saddle$(/l) to equip it.$(br)$(li)After that right click on it again, to start to ride it.$(br)$(li)You can walk with it normally, but they jump less than $(l:patchouli:pets/vanilla/horse)Horses$(/l).$(br)$(li)Tamed Donkeys can be bred giving them $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/golden_apple)Golden Apples$(/l) or $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/golden_carrot)Golden Carrots$(/l).
$(li)If a Donkey is bred with a $(l:patchouli:pets/vanilla/horse)Horse$(/l) they will create a $(l:patchouli:pets/vanilla/mule)Mule$(/l) foal.
$(li)You can equip a tamed Donkey with a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/chest)Chest$(/l) right clicking on it while you are holding a Chest in your hand.
$(li)If you shift + right click on it again, you will access to its inventory, where you can save items.
